entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is a main character in the story and is mentioned as being insulted by Mulciber and Avery. He is also mentioned as having hoisted Severus into the air and taunted him.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is a main character in the story and is mentioned as being insulted by James Potter. He is also mentioned as shouting at Lily in his humiliation and fury.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is a main character in the story and is mentioned as joining the group and going to Snape's defense. She is also mentioned as being shouted at by Snape.

entities.name: sirius

relationships.description: James Potter was insulted by Severus Snape. The text describes the scene where James and his friends were insulting Severus, and how Severus was humiliated and furious.
Severus Snape shouted at Lily in his humiliation and fury. The text describes the scene where Severus was shouting at Lily, using the unforgivable word 'Mudblood'.
